refnamediv.refpurpose: Parses the content of RDF embedded as RDFa text as a sequence of separate RDF triples.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Parses the content of RDF embedded as RDFa text as a sequence of separate RDF triples.

refsect2.title: rdfa_text
refsect2.para: text of document containing RDFa data

refsect2.title: omt_top_rdf
refsect2.para: base IRI to resolve relative IRIs

refsect1.title: Return Types
refsect1.para: The return value is not specified and may be changed in future versions.

example.title: Simple Use
example.screen:
SQL>sparql clear graph <http://virtuoso.openlinksw.com/example>; SQL> DB.DBA.RDF_LOAD_RDFA (http_get('http://virtuoso.openlinksw.com/pricing/'), 'http://virtuoso.openlinksw.com/pricing/#', 'http://virtuoso.openlinksw.com/example'); Done. -- 109 msec.
-- Check total triples retrieved: SQL>SPARQL SELECT COUNT(*) from <http://virtuoso.openlinksw.com/example> WHERE {?s ?p ?o}; callret-0 INTEGER _______________________________________________________________________________
1181
1 Rows. -- 16 msec.
